verses.verse: Now when<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> was born<WG1080> in<WG1722> Bethlehem<WG965> of Judea<WG2449> in<WG1722> the days<WG2250> of King<WG935> Herod,<WG2264> behold,<WG2400> wise men<WG3097> from<WG575> the east<WG395> came<WG3854> to<WG1519> Jerusalem,<WG2414> saying,

"Where<WG4226> is<WG2076> he<WG3588> who is<WG2076> born<WG5088> King<WG935> of the Jews?<WG2453> For<WG1063> we saw<WG1492> his<WG846> star<WG792> in<WG1722> the east,<WG395> and<WG2532> have come<WG2064> to worship<WG4352> him.<WG846>"
When<WG1161> King<WG935> Herod<WG2264> heard<WG191> it,<WG5015> he was troubled, and<WG2532> all<WG3956> Jerusalem<WG2414> with<WG3326> him.<WG846>

Gathering<WG4863> together<WG2532> all<WG3956> the chief priests<WG749> and<WG2532> scribes<WG1122> of the people,<WG2992> he asked<WG4441> them<WG846> where<WG4226> the Christ<WG5547> would be born.<WG1080>
They<WG1161> said<WG2036> to him,<WG846> "In<WG1722> Bethlehem<WG965> of Judea,<WG2449> for<WG1063> this<WG3779> is written<WG1125> through<WG1223> the prophet,<WG4396>

<WG4771> 'You Bethlehem,<WG965> land<WG1093> of Judah,<WG2448> are<WG1488> in no<WG3760> way least<WG1646> among<WG1722> the princes<WG2232> of<WG1537> Judah:<WG2448> for<WG1063> out of<WG1537> you<WG4675> shall come<WG1831> forth a governor,<WG2233> who shall shepherd my<WG3450> people,<WG2992> Israel.<WG2474>'"
Then<WG5119> Herod<WG2264> secretly<WG2977> called<WG2564> the wise men,<WG3097> and learned<WG198> from<WG3844> them<WG846> exactly<WG198> what time<WG5550> the star<WG792> appeared.<WG5316>

He sent<WG3992> them<WG846> to<WG1519> Bethlehem,<WG965> and<WG2532> said,<WG2036> "Go<WG4198> and search<WG1833> diligently<WG199> for<WG4012> the young child.<WG3813> When<WG1875> you have found<WG2147> him,<WG518> bring me<WG3427> word,<WG3704> so that I<WG2504> also<WG2504> may come<WG2064> and worship<WG4352> him.<WG846>"

They,<WG1161> having heard<WG191> the king,<WG935> went<WG4198> their way;<WG2532> and behold,<WG2400> the star,<WG792> which<WG3739> they saw<WG1492> in<WG1722> the east,<WG395> went before<WG4254> them,<WG846> until<WG2193> it came<WG2064> and stood<WG2476> over<WG1883> where<WG3757> the young child<WG3813> was.<WG2258>
When<WG1161> they saw<WG1492> the star,<WG792> they rejoiced<WG5463> with exceedingly<WG4970> great<WG3173> joy.<WG5479>

They came<WG2064> into<WG1519> the house<WG3614> and<WG2532> saw<WG2147> the young child<WG3813> with<WG3326> Mary,<WG3137> his<WG846> mother,<WG3384> and<WG2532> they fell down<WG4098> and<WG2532> worshiped<WG4352> him.<WG846> Opening<WG455> their<WG846> treasures,<WG2344> they offered<WG4374> to him<WG846> gifts:<WG1435> gold,<WG5557> frankincense,<WG3030> and<WG2532> myrrh.<WG4666>

Being<WG2532> warned in<WG2596> a dream<WG3677> that they<WG344> shouldn't<WG3361> return<WG344> to<WG4314> Herod,<WG2264> they went<WG402> back to<WG4314> their own<WG846> country<WG5561> another<WG243> way.<WG3598>

Now when<WG1161> they<WG846> had departed,<WG402> behold,<WG2400> an angel<WG32> of the Lord<WG2962> appeared<WG5316> to Joseph<WG2501> in<WG2596> a dream,<WG3677> saying,<WG3004> "Arise<WG1453> and take<WG3880> the young child<WG3813> and<WG2532> his<WG846> mother,<WG3384> and<WG2532> flee<WG5343> into<WG1519> Egypt,<WG125> and<WG2532> stay<WG2468> there<WG1563> until<WG2193> I<WG302> tell<WG2036> you,<WG4671> for<WG1063> Herod<WG2264> will<WG3195> seek<WG2212> the young child<WG3813> to destroy<WG622> him.<WG846>"
He arose<WG1453> and<WG2532> took<WG3880> the young child<WG3813> and<WG2532> his<WG846> mother<WG3384> by night,<WG3571> and<WG2532> departed<WG402> into<WG1519> Egypt,<WG125>

and<WG2532> was<WG2258> there<WG1563> until<WG2193> the death<WG5054> of Herod;<WG2264> that<WG2443> it might be fulfilled<WG4137> which was spoken<WG4483> by<WG1223> the Lord<WG2962> through<WG1223> the prophet,<WG4396> saying,<WG3004> "Out of<WG1537> Egypt<WG125> I called<WG2564> my<WG3450> son.<WG5207>"

Then<WG5119> Herod,<WG2264> when he saw<WG1492> that<WG3754> he was mocked<WG1702> by<WG5259> the wise men,<WG3097> was<WG2373> exceedingly<WG3029> angry,<WG2373> and<WG2532> sent out,<WG649> and killed<WG337> all<WG3956> the male children<WG3816> who were<WG3588> in<WG1722> Bethlehem<WG965> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> all<WG3956> the surrounding<WG3725> countryside,<WG846> from<WG575> two years old<WG1332> and<WG2532> under,<WG2736> according to<WG2596> the exact time<WG5550> which<WG3739> he had learned<WG198> from<WG3844> the wise men.<WG3097>
Then<WG5119> that which was spoken<WG4483> by<WG5259> Jeremiah<WG2408> the prophet<WG4396> was fulfilled,<WG4137> saying,<WG3004>

"A voice<WG5456> was<WG191> heard<WG191> in<WG1722> Ramah,<WG4471> lamentation,<WG2355> weeping<WG2799> and<WG2532> great<WG4183> mourning,<WG3602> Rachel<WG4478> weeping<WG2799> for her<WG846> children;<WG5043> she<WG2309> wouldn't<WG3756> be comforted,<WG3870> because<WG3754> they are<WG1526> no more.<WG3756>"
But when<WG1161> Herod<WG2264> was dead,<WG5053> behold,<WG2400> an angel<WG32> of the Lord<WG2962> appeared<WG5316> in<WG2596> a dream<WG3677> to Joseph<WG2501> in<WG1722> Egypt,<WG125> saying,

"Arise<WG1453> and<WG2532> take<WG3880> the young child<WG3813> and<WG2532> his<WG846> mother,<WG3384> and<WG2532> go<WG4198> into<WG1519> the land<WG1093> of Israel,<WG2474> for<WG1063> those who sought<WG2212> the young child<WG3813>'s life<WG5590> are dead.<WG2348>"
He arose<WG1453> and<WG2532> took<WG3880> the young child<WG3813> and<WG2532> his<WG846> mother,<WG3384> and<WG2532> came<WG2064> into<WG1519> the land<WG1093> of Israel.<WG2474>

But<WG1161> when he heard<WG191> that<WG3754> Archelaus<WG745> was reigning<WG936> over<WG1909> Judea<WG2449> in<WG1909> the place of<WG473> his<WG846> father,<WG3962> Herod,<WG2264> he was afraid<WG5399> to go<WG565> there.<WG1563> Being<WG1161> warned in<WG2596> a dream,<WG3677> he withdrew<WG402> into<WG1519> the region<WG3313> of Galilee,<WG1056>

and<WG2532> came<WG2064> and lived<WG2730> in<WG1519> a city<WG4172> called<WG3004> Nazareth;<WG3478> that<WG3704> it might be fulfilled<WG4137> which<WG3588> was spoken<WG4483> through<WG1223> the prophets:<WG3754> "He will be called<WG2564> a Nazarene.<WG3480>"
